wordpressPage.title: Governance
wordpressPage.excerpt: The WPCampus community is currently restructuring our governance. More information will be available soon about how to get involved and contribute to the community. Want to get involved with WPCampus?...
wordpressPage.content:
The WPCampus community is currently restructuring our governance. More information will be available soon about how to get involved and contribute to the community.

Want to get involved with WPCampus? Passionate about event planning or diversity and inclusion?

One way to support our organization is by getting involved with our committees and working groups.

WPCampus Committees

  • Diversity and Inclusion

WPCampus Working Groups

  • Community planning
  • Governance
  • WPCampus website

Meetings

All planning meetings are scheduled in advance and marked on our events calendar.

Communication

The majority of our communication takes place in our Slack account. We will use other technology from time to time but Slack will be the main outlet for discussion and a great place for our planning groups to chat and hold meetings.

If you are not a member of our Slack team, you can use our membership form to join. If you have already filled out the form, please contact us and include which email address youâ€™d like to use for the invitation.
